pos review: Friendliness and helpfulness of staff. Hotel location was superb for my needs. Breakfast sufficient for my needs. Enjoyed dinner on two evenings.

Location was excellent for Menin Gate and the centre of Ypres. 
Restaurant and breakfast were very good
neg review: The room was a little tired and could do with a spruce up

pos review: Excellent location. Good public parking available close at hand and at reasonable cost. Good breakfast.
neg review: Ensuite facilities very cramped. Decoration was very tired.

pos review: Very easy to book in and book out.  Great food and friendly staff.  Top location in the centre of Ypres.

neg review: Tiny bathroom with poor ventilation.  Interiors need overhaul. Very basic. A lick of paint does not do the job.

pos review: On the main square close to the Menin Gate and Museums
neg review: Seemed that the restaurant was much more important than the Hotel to the owners. No one about at breakfast time but food was ok, all self service.

pos review: Location & Breakfast, we spent little time in the hotel and ate out.
neg review: The room was adequate and clean but very compact, anything carried out in the bathroom needed careful planning, except a face wash and teeth cleaning! A 3 night stay became a bit waring.
